import React, { useEffect } from 'react' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import ProductCard from '../Component/ProductCard' import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom' import SearchBarAction from '../Store/Action/SearchBarAction' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import Star from '../Assets/Image/Star.png' const ProductView = () => { const dispatch = useDispatch() const { Title } = useParams(); console.log(Title) // SearchBarAction(dispatch, { searchValue: Title }) useEffect(() => { SearchBarAction(dispatch, { searchValue: Title }) }, [dispatch]) const data = useSelector(state => state.SearchBarReducer.SearchBarData) console.log("data===>", data) // console.log(id) return (<> {data ? data.map((item, index) => { (item.Title==T) return (
{item.Title}
{item.delievery_charge === null ? 'free shipping' : ''}
{item.brandData.name}

{item.Price.sell_price.$numberDecimal} ({item.Price.current_store_price.$numberDecimal})
9% OFF

) }) : null} ) } export default ProductView
